articles.title: Teen Who Built 'Iron Man' Suit Is Now...: Anand Mahindra Gives An Update - NDTV
articles.description: Anand Mahindra shared an update on Prem, the young man from Manipur who went viral on social media last year for building an Iron Man suit from scrap.
articles.content: New Delhi: The power of social media is unparalleled. A striking and rather heartwarming example of this is industrialist Anand Mahindra's latest post. The chairman of Mahindra Group has shared an up… [+2362 chars]
